headline.main: 2 Inmates Killed in Nebraska Prison Revolt Identified
headline.print_headline: 2 Inmates Killed in Nebraska Prison Revolt Identified

docs.snippet: Authorities on Friday released the names of two inmates who were killed in a riot at a Nebraska prison where a similar deadly incident occurred two years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities on Friday released the names of two inmates who were killed in a riot at a Nebraska prison where a similar deadly incident occurred two years ago.

headline.main: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional

docs.snippet: A judge has declared unconstitutional a recently-adopted policy favored by President Donald Trump that allows Miami-Dade County jails to hold immigrants who face deportation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A judge has declared unconstitutional a recently-adopted policy favored by President Donald Trump that allows Miami-Dade County jails to hold immigrants who face deportation.

headline.main: Baseball: Team USA Want Their Turn to Celebrate at WBC
headline.print_headline: Baseball: Team USA Want Their Turn to Celebrate at WBC

docs.snippet: Team USA, after three swings and misses at the World Baseball Classic, are determined not to strike out again in the game's top international competition, which gets underway on Monday in Seoul....
docs.lead_paragraph: Team USA, after three swings and misses at the World Baseball Classic, are determined not to strike out again in the game's top international competition, which gets underway on Monday in Seoul.

headline.main: Review: ‘Beauty and the Beast’ Revels in Joy and Enchantment
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Beauty and the Beast’ Revels in Joy and Enchantment

docs.snippet: A compassionate Belle and a splendid monster are the hallmarks of this live-action remake of the 1991 animated film....
docs.lead_paragraph: A compassionate Belle and a splendid monster are the hallmarks of this live-action remake of the 1991 animated film.

headline.main: Amsterdam Artists Hold 'Nasty Woman' Show to Raise Money for Women's Rights
headline.print_headline: Amsterdam Artists Hold 'Nasty Woman' Show to Raise Money for Women's Rights

docs.snippet: U.S. President Donald Trump and Dutch anti-Islam election candidate Geert Wilders are portrayed in headscarves worn by Muslim women in a protest exhibition in Amsterdam to raise money for women's rights organizations....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump and Dutch anti-Islam election candidate Geert Wilders are portrayed in headscarves worn by Muslim women in a protest exhibition in Amsterdam to raise money for women's rights organizations.

headline.main: Private Equity Firms Offer to Buy Shawbrook Bank in $1 Billion Deal
headline.print_headline: Private Equity Firms Offer to Buy Shawbrook Bank in $1 Billion Deal

docs.snippet: British bank Shawbrook Group Plc said on Friday it has received an offer from private equity firms Pollen Street Capital and BC Partners to buy the lender in a deal worth 825 million pounds ($1.01 billion)....
docs.lead_paragraph: British bank Shawbrook Group Plc said on Friday it has received an offer from private equity firms Pollen Street Capital and BC Partners to buy the lender in a deal worth 825 million pounds ($1.01 billion).

headline.main: Dior Sees Blue, Issey Miyake Looks to Northern Lights at Paris Shows
headline.print_headline: Dior Sees Blue, Issey Miyake Looks to Northern Lights at Paris Shows

docs.snippet: French fashion house Christian Dior is seeing blue for women's wardrobes next winter, with artistic director Maria Grazia Chiuri turning to one of the preferred colors of the luxury label's founding designer for her latest collection....
docs.lead_paragraph: French fashion house Christian Dior is seeing blue for women's wardrobes next winter, with artistic director Maria Grazia Chiuri turning to one of the preferred colors of the luxury label's founding designer for her latest collection.

headline.main: Mosul Victims Treated for Chemical Agents as Displacement Accelerates
headline.print_headline: Mosul Victims Treated for Chemical Agents as Displacement Accelerates

docs.snippet: The number of civilians escaping the fighting in Mosul has increased significantly as battles intensify between U.S.-backed Iraqi forces and Islamic State militants, and some have been exposed to chemical agents, the Red Cross said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of civilians escaping the fighting in Mosul has increased significantly as battles intensify between U.S.-backed Iraqi forces and Islamic State militants, and some have been exposed to chemical agents, the Red Cross said on Friday.

headline.main: Brazil's Fast-Growing Fintechs Form Groups to Discuss Regulation
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Fast-Growing Fintechs Form Groups to Discuss Regulation

docs.snippet: Financial technology firms in Brazil are grouping to discuss with local watchdogs how to regulate the fast-growing sector, in which the number of players has risen roughly six-fold over the past couple of years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Financial technology firms in Brazil are grouping to discuss with local watchdogs how to regulate the fast-growing sector, in which the number of players has risen roughly six-fold over the past couple of years.
